message.content:
Ndiyakuncedisa ngezinto ozifunayo. Ndibhalela iskripthi emnandi kwiwebhusayithi. Hamba uzizamelelele ngokwesibini:

1. Ukufaka i-email:
   a. Hambisa imayili i-intanethi.
   b. Kufakela iindawo ezikhethiweyo ezibonakalayo ngokukhetha i-email.
   c. Hambisa i-email address yomntu ozifunayo.
   d. Hambisa iindawo ezifunekayo ezimelwe i-email, ngokuphakama kwe-email address.
   e. Hambisa iindawo ezifunekayo ezingama-CC (Carbon Copy) uma kunjalo.
   f. Bhalisa iindawo ezifunekayo ezizimeleyo ezingama-BCC (Blind Carbon Copy) uma kunjalo.
   g. Hambisa i-subject line, ezifunekayo ezifaka ngokuphakama kwe-email.
   h. Hambisa phakathi iintsapho zokuqala, ezifunekayo ukuba zifakwe phakathi nje kwakunye nesithunywa.
   i. Hambisa umlayezo wemibuzo, okanye umlayezo wokuba yintoni ozifunayo.
   j. Hambisa i-attachment okanye iifayela ezifunekayo, uma kufuneka.
   k. Hambisa umlayezo wesikrini ngokuphakama kwe-email.
   l. Hambisa i-email ngokuphakama kwe-email okanye isendelela.

2. Ukufaka i-inkcukacha:
   a. Hambisa i-inkcukacha emnandi kwiwebhusayithi.
   b. Bheka ngokwezintathu ngokufanelekile ukuba i-inkcukacha iyakufakwa.
   c. Hambisa i-inkcukacha phakathi kwezikhompyutha okanye iif
